title: To Constantinople (Australian postcard, ca. 1915-16)
Text:: To Constantinople. Britannia called, and swift ere the trumpets echoes died away, / The gathering forces of her children marched in stern array, / From Ice-bound shores and India’s burning strand, / From wave-tipped Isles and Austal’s sunny land, / To do or die they came, Brave Heroes of the Dardanelles.Year  ca. 1915-16.Publisher  NA.Artist  NA.Additional information  Australian postcard from the First World War showing Britannia urging two soldiers on during an assault at Gallipoli, the soldiers stepping on an Ottoman flag as they go.
